channel.title: The way people view us
channel.description:
Apparently people view us differently than we view ourselves. This is so strange. How someone might've collected this data and it be so wrong. Just confuses me.
http://www.quantcast.com/moparisthebest.com

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

the fu superior:

Lots of MPSCP’ers act like girls saying “z0mg i luv dildoes!!!”

No… just no.

[quote=“Niall, post:31, topic:177600”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=238521.msg2033437#msg2033437 date=1202200106]

I don’t know where these sites get their stats from, it even says moparisthebest.com has mostly females on it, when the real ratio is probably better than 100:1.

I’m thinking more like 1000:1, judging by the overwhelming spam.
[/quote]

I’m thinking more along the lines of: 0.000381105743 females to every 1 male. Meaning there is roughly 71 females for all 183k registrants.[/quote]

Yes, probably. However, we must include all those who are crossgendered on the forum:

Male to Female Ratio: 15.3:1

Read full topic

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:27, topic:177600”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=238521.msg2032870#msg2032870 date=1202183481]
I don’t know where these sites get their stats from, it even says moparisthebest.com has mostly females on it, when the real ratio is probably better than 100:1.
[/quote]

I’m thinking more like 1000:1, judging by the overwhelming spam.[/quote]

I’m thinking more along the lines of: 0.000381105743 females to every 1 male. Meaning there is roughly 71 females for all 183k registrants.

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Ixl Adds Ixl, post:28, topic:177600”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=238521.msg2032906#msg2032906 date=1202184683]
Because probably people think they are funny when they act transgendered.
[/quote]

thats because they are transgended! WHy you think they talk shit behind a computer all day huh?[/quote]

/hypocrite

You are asking him why he talks shit behind a computer. Firstly, I don’t think that is humanely possible. Second, assuming I understanding your implication, then you are being a hypocrite because he didn’t do anything and you are the one actually calling people trans gendered. In other words, stfu.

Read full topic

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Excuse me, I was wrong on my statement. Google did not bid for yahoo for 61 million. I was unsure, I had only heard it on the news just recently, it may have just been speculation. Though it looks to me that Google may bid in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

I’m quite sure Google hasn’t even made a bid to buy Yahoo. Please prove me wrong, however.
http://network.nationalpost.com/np/blogs/fpposted/archive/2008/02/03/google-responds-to-microsoft-s-offer-to-buy-yahoo.aspx

Read full topic

item.title: The way people view us
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:19, topic:177600”][quote author=goatee link=topic=238521.msg2030704#msg2030704 date=1202076924]
What retard uses Yahoo? Everyone says google it not yahoo it!

Microsoft/Bill gates is buying Yahoo because they want to pwn google. Well my dad said so anyways.
[/quote]

Actually, Google just made a 61 million dollar bid on acquiring Yahoo.[/quote]
So bad a billion is much more than a million, Microsoft bid much more on Yahoo than google.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Taios, post:12, topic:177600”]http://www.quantcast.com/sythe.org
How does it have more visitors then mopar? wtf?[/quote]

RuneScape Player -> Mopar
Mopar person banned -> rune-server
rune-server person bored/banned -> sythe
sythe person bored/banned -> rune-server

etc etc etc

This site reaches approximately 8,054 U.S. monthly uniques. The site caters to a youth/child centric, largely female, more Asian audience.The typical visitor visits nexon.net and plays games on crazymonkeygames.com
